name: Eden Gardens
pitch_report: Balanced pitch, favors spinners in the second innings.

name: Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium
pitch_report: Batting-friendly, but can assist pacers early with the new ball.

name: MA Chidambaram Stadium
pitch_report: Spin-friendly surface, tough for fast bowlers.

name: ACA-VDCA Cricket Stadium
pitch_report: Good batting track with a lush outfield, can assist pacers early.

name: Narendra Modi Stadium
pitch_report: Varied pitch, supports both batsmen and bowlers depending on conditions.

name: Barsapara Cricket Stadium
pitch_report: Balanced pitch, offers assistance to both pacers and spinners.

name: Wankhede Stadium
pitch_report: Batting-friendly with good bounce, ideal for high-scoring matches.

name: BRSABV Ekana Cricket Stadium
pitch_report: Slow pitch, favors spinners and tactical batting.

name: M. Chinnaswamy Stadium
pitch_report: Batting paradise with short boundaries, high-scoring matches expected.

name: Maharaja Yadavindra Singh International Cricket Stadium
pitch_report: New pitch, expected to be balanced with assistance for seamers.

name: Sawai Mansingh Stadium
pitch_report: Balanced pitch, offers something for both batsmen and bowlers.

name: Arun Jaitley Stadium
pitch_report: Slow pitch, helps spinners and medium pacers.

name: Himachal Pradesh Cricket Association Stadium
pitch_report: Bowling-friendly, assists pacers with swing due to altitude.
